forest_clearing.description: Hazel the squirrel wakes up to a bright morning in the forest. What will she do today?

oak_tree.description: You return to the familiar oak tree. The branches sway gently in the breeze. You hear singing birds chirping in the tree.

choices.text: Rummage through the leaves at the base of the tree
Climb to the top of the tree

birds_nest.description: You climb up to the birds' nest. The mother bird chirps anxiously as you see a baby bird that has fallen out of the nest.

choices.text: Keep climbing to the top of the tree

nut_grove.description: Hazel finds a grove full of nuts, but also sees a hungry hedgehog.

riverbank.description: Hazel arrives at the riverbank. Robin the mouse is here, looking worried. The beaver is busy with his dam. The river is flowing fast, and you notice a sturdy wooden footbridge crossing the river.

meadow_morning.description: In the morning, the meadow is full of wildflowers and butterflies. It feels peaceful here.

meadow_dusk.description: As the sun sets, the meadow is full of fireflies and the sounds of crickets. The air is cool and the sky is a beautiful shade of pink and orange.

bridge.description: The bridge is a wooden structure spanning the river. It looks sturdy.

rummage_leaves.description: You find a big pile of fall leaves that smell like autumn. As you rummage through the leaves, you find a few acorns.

choices.text: Go back to the Oak Tree.

top_of_tree.description: You climb to the top of the tree.  You see a beautiful view of the forest below. The wind is blowing strong, and you feel a bit dizzy.

choices.text: Climb back down the tree but you slip and fall
Jump off because you are a flying squirell

free_fall.description:
Sailing through the air with your limbs outstretched, you feel the air supporting you as you gently glide towards the ground.   The sun shines on your face and you close your eyes.  

Drifting quietly you open your eyes and see the river down below...

choices.text: You steer towards the little wooden footbridge to visit the Robin
You steer back around towards the Oak Tree hoping to find acorns to take home.

whispering_brook.location: A moonlit brook in the forest, water tumbling over mossy stones.
whispering_brook.description: The water's music carries a hidden melody.

ancient_oak.location: High in an ancient oak's branches, the wind carries a second melody.
ancient_oak.description: The air is alive with the rustle of leaves—another verse waiting to be heard.

choices.text: Climb and listen to the wind's breath

hollow_log.location: A fallen tree hollowed by time, its darkness filled with echoes.
hollow_log.description: Inside the log, the echoes of lost songs swirl and blend.

twilight_clearing.location: A twilight clearing bathed in the glow of fireflies.
twilight_clearing.description: The hush of twilight holds another secret verse.

spirit_stone_circle.location: A circle of ancient stones inscribed with runes of power.
spirit_stone_circle.description: The stones seem to pulse with the forest’s oldest magic.

moonlit_grove.location: A sacred grove, lit by the moon’s silver glow.
moonlit_grove.description: This is the heart of the forest, where the Echo of the First Song can be sung.

choices.text: Sing the complete Echo of the First Song

moonlit_grove_the_second.location: A sacred grove, lit by the moon’s silver glow.
moonlit_grove_the_second.description: This is the heart of the forest, where the Echo of the First Song can be sung.

choices.text: Sing the complete Echo of the First Song
